title: Micropound
text: The micropound (abbreviation μlb) is a small unit of <a href="avoirdupois">avoirdupois</a> <a href="weight">weight</a> and <a href="mass">mass</a> in the <a href="US%20customary%20unit">US</a> and <a href="imperial%20units">imperial</a> <a href="systems%20of%20measurement">systems of measurement</a>, equal to one-millionth () <a href="avoirdupois%20pound">pound</a>. It is equal to exactly kg or about 453.6<a href="microgram">μg</a>.
